wikipedia_page.main: Amy Leach (born 14 April 1981) is a British theatre director.

response: *  1981   – Amy Leach, English director and producer

* A Christmas Carol (2017), a new adaptation by Deborah McAndrew, directed by Amy Leach for Hull Truck Theatre. This production transferred to the Leeds Playhouse for Christmas 2018, then it returned during the Christmas 2020 season (and online during the COVID-19 pandemic). This version relocates the story to the North of Victorian, England.
* Amy Leach (theatre director) (born 1981), British theatre director
